question: Cash Sales are between the business and:
Purchase returns involve an ______ of inventory and a ______ in the amount owing the supplier.
Which of the following is not a reason for a Sales Return.
A Credit Sale will ______ the GST ledger account.
A Cash Purchase of inventory will ______ the inventory ledger, ______ the bank ledger and ______ the GST ledger.
Credit Purchase involves:
choice1: Recieving inventory today and paying at a later arranged date.
choice2: Pre-paying for inventory received in the future.
choice3: Paying for inventory purchased last month.

question: If the business damages an item of inventory they should:
choice1: Try to sell the item to a customer who doesn't know about the damage.
choice2: Try to sell the item at a discount, inform the customer of the damage.
choice3: Send it back to the supplier and say it was broken when it arrived.
choice4: Throw the item in the bin.
